name: Rayman Origins
synopsis: A Massive World: Rayman Origins includes over 60 levels of 2D platforming gameplay. Epic Boss Fights: A giant pink monster with hundreds of eyes. A possessed, mountainous golem...and more! Variety of Gameplay: Rayman Origins is a platformer at its core but also features many elements of action, adventure, shooter and beat-’em-up gameplay. StreetPass Functionality: Taking advantage of StreetPass, you can share your progression, number of collectibles, time played, unlocked achievements, and avatar with others. Unique Approach, Unique Game: Rayman Origins was created by Michel Ancel with a small team of artists and developers to produce not only high-quality graphics and gameplay, but a creative and unique experience. Rebirth of a Platforming Legend: It’s been 15 years since the first launch of Rayman. Rayman Origins brings back many of the classic characters, revived in their original 2D form, as well as a whole new world of characters and environments.
